CHAPTER 20 ■Scientific Reasoning
Intelligent design is a good explanation for a number of biochemical
systems, but I should insert a word of caution. Intelligent design theory
has to be seen in context: it does not try to explain everything. We live in a
complex world where lots of different things can happen. When deciding
